properties.title: Kunsthaus Zürich
properties.abstract: The museum shows international works of significance including many paintings by Edvard Munch, Van Gogh, Picasso and leading Expressionists as well as highlights of Swiss art of the 19th and 20th centuries.
properties.description:
International works of significance include many paintings by Edvard Munch, Van Gogh, Picasso and leading Expressionists. There is also a significant group of works by Claude Monet and Marc Chagall. Amongst modern artistic trends represented by Rothko, Merz, Twombly, Beuys, Bacon and Baselitz the visitors can discover a wide choice of Popart works. An audio guide gives background information on 200 «highlights» of the collection.

The highlights of Swiss art of the 19th and 20th centuries include work by Johann Heinrich Füssli or Ferdinant Hodler. Contemporary Swiss artists such as Pipilotti Rist and Peter Fischli and David Weiss as well as photography and installations are also represented in the museum.
properties.name: Zürich Tourismus
